DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia Oceania . The aim trial compare efficacy safety human insulin produce current process NN729 process type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Human Insulin Produced Current Process NN729 Process Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Duration diabetes least 12 month Basal/bolus treatment human insulin least 2 month precede trial start Body Mass Index ( BMI ) lesser equal 35.0 kg/m2 HbA1c lesser equal 12.0 % Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment laser treatment within last 6 month Any condition investigator and/or sponsor feel would interfere trial participation Known suspect allergy trial product relate product
